mapper.select:
select pa.row_id from landing.if_reclaimaqui_retrieve_ticket_by_id lirr join process.account pa on lirr.id = pa.reclame_aqui_id__c where lirr.row_id in
CAST(#{item} AS INTEGER)

select pc.row_id from landing.if_reclaimaqui_retrieve_ticket_by_id lirr join process.case pc on lirr.source_external_id = pc.reclame_aqui_external_id__c where lirr.row_id in
CAST(#{item} AS INTEGER)
